Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Hp-MAP3 (synthetic AMPs, Lys-rich; Leu-rich; variant of temporin-PTa, UCLL1)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, amphibians, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (69.23%) toHp-MAP2L: 46%; K: 31%; V: 15%. GRAVY: 1.34; M Wt: 1479; Mol formula: C73H139N17O14; Mol Ex coeff: 0.Activity: active against Gram- A. baumannii (MIC 2.7 uM), E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 5.4-10.8 uM), K. pneumoniae ATCC 13883 (MIC 5.4-10.8 uM), P. aeruginosa (MIC 43.3 uM), Gram+ S. aureus (MIC 43.3 uM). Literature Information.Title: Evaluation of the Synthetic Multifunctional Peptide Hp-MAP3 Derivative of Temporin-PTa
